description: This file implements the basic functions for a system context object related to RRO Hcxt in a BroadWay Runtime System environment. It contains object creation, destruction, enrollment, and initialization routines, including function pointers and object lifecycle management.

classes.name: SYS_RRO_HCXT_OBJECT
classes.description: Main object structure representing the system RRO Hcxt instance, including function pointers for object management and internal data fields.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE SysRroHcxtCreate(ANSC_HANDLE hContainerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hOwnerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hAnscReserved)
methods.description: Constructs and initializes a new Sys Rro Hcxt Object, assigning function pointers and setting context handles.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SysRroHcxtRemove(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Destroys the Sys Rro Hcxt Object, freeing associated resources.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SysRroHcxtEnrollObjects(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Enrolls or initializes subordinate or dependent objects required by this object.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SysRroHcxtInitialize(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Performs initialization of the object, setting function pointers and data members.
